item.description: Flooding; INC#1618; 09:31PM; 6050 W Fountain Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3XYQxLl; #Hollywood; Firefighters are on scene of a broken water main in the middle of the street, which is shooting water approximately 30 feet into the air. A sink hole appears to be forming (unknown if the hole in the street is growing?) and several homes in the area are being evacuated as a precaution. DWP, DOT, Building and Safety, and LAPD (Inc 4997) notified. ; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; E227 E82 T27; CH7; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#0491; 10:20AM; 8600 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3YhtKtD; #Sunland; Firefighters successfully extricated an approximately 45-year-old male and transported him in critical condition. The second patient was an approximately 75-year-old female who was treated and transported in serious condition.; FS 24; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E24 E274 E289 E298 E77 E98 EM12 H0E HR3 RA60 RA7 RA98 RH114 T74 T89 T98 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#0491; 09:51AM; 8600 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3YhtKtD; #Sunland; Two-vehicle collision with two patients (one trapped). Firefighters are working to extricate the trapped victim.; FS 24; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E24 E274 E298 E98 EM12 HR3 RA7 RA98 T74 T98 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1709; 11:16PM; 7257 N Hesperia Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3jplHMI; #Reseda; Firefighters quickly knocked back the flames that were originally intense at the front of the structure. It took some additional time to chase fire that was inside the walls. Ultimately, it took 22 firefighters 16 minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 73; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC17 E100 E103 E273 E293 E73 RA73 T73 T93; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1709; 11:00PM; 7257 N Hesperia Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3jplHMI; #Reseda; Two-story single-family home, well-involved with fire.; FS 73; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC17 E100 E273 E73 RA73 T73; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1685; 10:49PM; 3556 W Slauson Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HRACbK; #HydePark; The first 16 firefighters quickly extinguished the flames in 9 minutes. The fully-involved structure was not threatening any nearby buildings. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E266 E66 E94 RA266 RA66 RA866 T66; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1685; 10:40PM; 3556 W Slauson Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HRACbK; #HydePark; One-story bungalow, well-involved with fire.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E266 E66 E94 RA266 T66; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Update Hazardous Materials; INC#1548; 09:50PM; 601 E Venice Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3l2Nsv5; #Venice; After obtaining a better view of the inside of the vehicle (despite condensation on the windows obstructing their view), firefighters discovered that the reported propane inside the vehicle was coming from small camping-style propane bottles. While the exact circumstances are unknown, it *appears* to have been an unhoused man (approx 70 years old) who was trying to stay warm in an enclosed space (propane-powered heat lamp) and, sadly, succumbed to accidental asphyxiation (oxygen displaced by leaking propane). There was no fire involved in this incident.; FS 63; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E263 E295 E95 JT1 RA63 SQ95 T63 T95; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Hazardous Materials; INC#1548; 08:42PM; 601 E Venice Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3l2Nsv5; #Venice; Firefighters responded for an unknown medical problem (reports of a person unresponsive in a vehicle). Upon arrival, what is believed to be flammable substances (liquid? gas?) were observed in the vehicle. Therefore, the response has been upgraded to a hazardous materials incident. LAPD Inc 4357.; FS 63; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E263 E 295 E95 JT1 RA63 SQ95 T63 T95; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Fall; INC#1097; 03:58PM; SB 110 Fwy x Imperial Hwy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RnapFp; #VermontVista; LAFD Firefighter-Paramedics arrived to find one patient on the freeway, reportedly having plummeted from the overpass, down into the freeway lanes (fell? jumped?). The patient was rapidly transported in grave condition to a nearby hospital. CHP Log #1629. Nothing further.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; E64 RA264 RA864; CH4; Nicholas Prange
